attributes.action: Give tradesmen the right to get there money off non paying customers
attributes.additional_details: Make it our rights to either a take back what's ours even if it's in a house. Or b a law that states if they do not pay they will be arrested and charged with theft
attributes.background: We as tradesmen go thru a lot. Customers refuse to pay us or company's and then claim bankruptcy or the like. And sometimes it's over 50k. And we can not do anything.

rejection.details:
It is already possible to seek redress through the courts for non-payment of a bill:
https://www.gov.uk/make-court-claim-for-money
https://www.moneyclaim.gov.uk
